metadata.name: mod_flexicontent - Carousel Layout
metadata.author: ggppdk
metadata.description: Flexicontent Universal Content Module, CAROUSEL Layout

field.default:
NOTE:
-- ONLY standard items are placed inside the carousel.
-- the featured items are display statically above the carousel. Set featured items to zero to only show items inside carousel

field.name: carousel_padding_top_bottom
field.label: Padding top/bottom
field.description: This is the padding applied at top and bottom of the items

field.name: carousel_padding_left_right
field.label: Padding left/right
field.description: This is the padding applied at left and right of the items

field.name: carousel_hdir_item_width
field.label: item width
field.description: Width of items when scrolling horizontally

field.name: carousel_hdir_margin_right
field.label: Padding right
field.description: This is the margin applied at right of items in a horizontal carousel

field.name: carousel_vdir_items
field.label: # items
field.description: Number of items that will be displayed when scrolling vertically

field.name: carousel_vdir_margin_bottom
field.label: Margin bottom
field.description: This is the margin applied at bottom of items in a vertical carousel

field.name: carousel_show_handles
field.label: Enable
field.description: Display One Thumbnail will be created per content item, and content will be accessible via click or mouseover

field.name: carousel_handle_width
field.label: Width
field.description: This is the width of thumbnail image of each item

field.name: carousel_handle_height
field.label: Height
field.description: This is the height of thumbnail image of each item

field.name: carousel_handle_event
field.label: Activation Event
field.description: How the content item buttons get activated

field.name: carousel_autoplay
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: Carousel will start playing after page loads

field.name: carousel_duration
field.label: Change duration (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds that a carousel change will last

field.name: carousel_show_controls
field.label: Playback Controls
field.description: Carousel will display stop, previous, next, etc controls

field.name: carousel_show_curritem_info
field.label:
Mini Information
(current item)
field.description: Carousel will one button per content item
